page.title: 16SHIPLEY
page.content: There are alot of sporting things to do in Shipley, there is a golf course, horse riding and plenty of space for walking. The place where people come and bring their caravans and park them is at the bottom of Cinderhill Coppice. The hill at the top is fenced off and there are plenty of little saplings which look likely to grow into a mini forest. Home Farm is another attraction that people go to see, especially school parties. They keep many sorts of farm animals which visitors are encouraged to meet at close quarters.
